html:
12.11.21  5:05 pm   If Steve's name is actually my name, then why does he call himself Steve?

      to get the video off to a roaring start

12.11.21  4:21 pm   how are you so cool

      i'm just you

12.11.21  3:22 pm   HOW TO DO THING?

      it's you. you're the thing

12.11.21  2:27 pm   how do you choose the questions that go in this page?

      i don't know

12.11.21  1:51 pm   would you ever use a loop for a song? a drum loop perhaps?

      usually no

12.11.21  11:00 am   thoughts on books

      amazing, especially if computers don't exist yet

12.11.21  9:37 am   whats the biggest number you can think of

      1

12.11.21  9:37 am   what makes things cool?.

      you might have to do it

12.11.21  7:40 am   The most outrageous emotion felt today?

      even just average emotions are too outrageous to name or describe

12.11.21  12:22 am   what do you think about dense, solid bricks of bread

      makes me want to build a fort

12.10.21  11:13 pm   What's your thoughts on the ocean

      too big. need a bridge

12.10.21  10:07 pm   thoughts on self diagnosis

      get a second opinion: do it twice

12.10.21  9:47 pm   What's your stance on love? 

      i vote yes on it

12.10.21  9:25 pm   what do you think about the fact that I judge your character by projecting myself onto you?

      that's normal

12.10.21  8:07 pm   would you believe me if i told you that i saw an unidentified flying ufo before?

      if you give me a tape i could watch it on my vhs system

12.10.21  7:22 pm   what is your favourite sound

      it's a tie between 'yep' and 'nope'

12.10.21  7:07 pm   Is it a bad thing if my mind is in the gutter?

      the gutter is good. it prevents flooding

12.10.21  3:59 pm   why is at the airport terminal so perfectly harmonized
i just listened to it 5 times in a row and didn't get enough 

      i made a contractual agreement with myself long ago that i will spank myself if i do not harmonize well. and just to be clear about this, spanking is not a turn on for me

12.10.21  3:27 pm   Are the lyrics in your songs supposed to mean something or the words are just randomly picked?

      it's supposed to make the overall song as good and meaningful as possible

12.10.21  2:10 pm   thoughts on buckets?

      i'm impressed

12.10.21  12:05 pm   are you a person

      oh, that would explain some of these outrageous feelings i've been having

12.10.21  11:46 am   wait you found a solution for freaking out? what is it??

      it's always different, and always unfortunately proven wrong by the next freakout

12.10.21  10:49 am   what is the best chord progression?

      Am F C G

12.10.21  9:08 am   What would make you never write another song again?

      maybe if the universe was destroyed

12.10.21  8:03 am   Thoughts on towels

      you must keep them dry. dry off your towel with a towel before you use it, to make sure it is dry

12.10.21  5:53 am   what is your favourite part of pencil?

      the eraser

12.10.21  4:29 am   why did the chicken cross the road?

      someone's gotta do it

12.10.21  2:14 am   Weirdest timeplace a song has struck you?

      on a writing session. this is weird because songs normally love to occur nowhere near the damn writing session

12.10.21  12:20 am   would you say you that you are smarter than a gorilla

      that all depends which gorilla

12.9.21  11:04 pm   I really really want to make music, and if I knew how I would be doing it nonstop. However, I don't know where to learn it or where to look to find it and just playing stuff hasn't taught me much at all.

      i have some good and bad news. no one knows. this is bad news because no one knows how to do it. but it's good news because it means you can do it without knowing how

12.9.21  11:04 pm   how do i make a change

      act like you're gonna keep things the same, and then see what that makes you feel

12.9.21  10:43 pm   how crispy is crispy?

      1

12.9.21  10:37 pm   hi i just wanted to say i think it's very cool how the traffic lights change in time with the percussion in got some money, it makes me happy

      that's good, i'm looking forward to doing some other happy things also

12.9.21  10:14 pm   How does one become as awesome as you?

      be as awesome as you

12.9.21  8:56 pm   What do you think about song mashups?

      would prefer a mash down

12.9.21  7:37 pm   why didn't you make any songs in 2012

      i spent the whole year writing songs. about half of "here comes the sun" was written in 2012. the chorus of "la de da" was written in 2012. the verses of "it's gonna be alright" were written in 2012. "the road" was written in 2012. "we could just get high" was mostly written in 2012. "alphabet shuffle" was mostly written in 2012. the chorus of "hallelujah" was written in 2012. "new canaan" was revised in 2012. almost half of "this is a song for my next album" was written in 2012. about 100 other unreleased/unfinished songs had their writing worked on during 2012

12.9.21  7:02 pm   what's the biggest mystery in the universe? 

      you

12.9.21  6:51 pm   Whats the last problem you found a solution for 

      freaking out

12.9.21  5:54 pm   What is the meaning of life

      movement

12.9.21  5:29 pm   do you know when your next video will be coming out

     no, i just hope it's as soon as possible

     and if so and if you want to can you please tell us when?

12.9.21  3:05 pm   In "I've done a bad thing". What exactly was the bad thing you did? Because I'm wondering what you did

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

12.9.21  2:23 pm   thoughts on trees

      they don't have to think. they are thunk

12.9.21  2:22 pm   what next huge awesome thing should be invented

      smallness

12.9.21  1:55 pm   when did you start writing your next song

      october 19, 2021

12.9.21  1:53 pm   what month are you planning on releasing the next song in

      the plan was nov 2, 2021

12.9.21  1:24 pm   I noticed something out "more than a dream". While most of your songs feel very short and flow the time fast, this one felt longer. But it did it in a different way than other songs that feel long. One could use the analogy of walking through a desert versus walking through a jungle. In the desert (representing the other songs that feel long), there is no scenery, nothing new. In the jungle (more than a dream), you see new, interesting things all the time. Was this intentional?

     just doing the best i can

     Just an interesting thing I noticed.

12.9.21  12:52 pm   Do you think becoming signed by a record label could be beneficial for you?

      didn't know those even existed anymore

12.9.21  12:39 pm   From 1-10, 10 being the most, how much do you like making music?

      9. that's 9 points for the fact that it can save the world, and 1 point of anxiety because what if i screw it up

12.9.21  11:20 am   How to drop all biases and learn from your mistakes?

      first, get a good cover photo, for the book

12.9.21  8:36 am   Are you on TikTok?

     no

     Cuz there's an account that claims to be you.

     well then it's not
